long_description: Justin's Chocolate Nut butter features all-natural ingredients and is made using a special grinding process that creates an irresistible texture and flavor. Convenient 1.15 oz. squeeze pack lets you bring this great-tasting treat along on backpacking trips and family picnics. Enjoy on sandwiches, crackers and fruit, or eat it right from the package. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Justin's Chocolate Nut butter features all-natural ingredients and is made using a special grinding process that creates an irresistible texture and flavor.
